channel.title: OPML on Argolon Solutions
channel.description: Recent content in OPML on Argolon Solutions

item.title: Disintermediation of Job Sites
item.description: It was remiss of us not to quickly follow up on a discussion back in early January over at Eirepreneur about the difficulties faced by both job seekers and start-ups in finding each other. The job-seekers have no easy way to identify which start-ups are looking for people whilst start-ups like ourselves find the cost of advertising nationally on a regular basis prohibitive. Our comment to James was that we found the costs too high and the results to be mediocre in using both Monster.
